title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Fidelity Investments: Text-to-SQL for data analytics at enterprise scale-IND3323
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity Investments：企业级数据分析的文本转SQL技术 - IND3323
abstract: Learn how Fidelity Institutional (FI) developed and implemented a sophisticated Text-to-SQL generative AI solution that enables non-technical domain experts to interact with complex structured data using natural language. Dive deep into the architecture and technical implementation details of a system that handles complex database schemas, multiple table relationships, and generates complex SQL queries. We’ll cover advanced topics including natural language understanding optimization, query re-write, vector search, SQL generation strategies, query safety mechanisms, and performance tuning for large-scale structured data operations. Discover the validation frameworks, monitoring systems, and API design patterns that make this solution robust and reusable.
abstract_cn: 了解富达机构(FI)如何开发和实施一个复杂的文本转SQL生成式AI解决方案,使非技术领域专家能够使用自然语言与复杂的结构化数据进行交互。深入探讨该系统的架构和技术实施细节,该系统可处理复杂的数据库模式、多表关系并生成复杂的SQL查询。我们将涵盖高级主题,包括自然语言理解优化、查询重写、向量搜索、SQL生成策略、查询安全机制以及大规模结构化数据操作的性能调优。了解使该解决方案稳健且可重用的验证框架、监控系统和API设计模式。

presenter.name: Manish Worlikar
presenter.title: Head of FI Artificial Intelligence CoE

presenter.name: Ray Zhang
presenter.title: VP of AI/ML engineering, Fidelity Institution
